headline: Indices firmer; Energy leads; VIX up on green
summary_text: SPX +0.24%, NDX +0.17%, DJI +0.32%. Sector breadth: 8 up / 3 down. Leaders: Energy (+1.15%), Information Technology (+0.48%). Laggards: Communication Services (-0.09%), Health Care (-0.03%). Semis (SOX) +0.29% — a proxy for AI/mega-cap risk. Vol regime: Moderate (VIX 14.85, +1.57%). Nasdaq vol (VXN 18.69, +2.75%). US Dollar (DXY) -0.02% — watch for macro crosswinds. Commodities (GSCI) +0.57%. Unusual: volatility up while indices green → hedging demand into catalysts.
